Define output link to open a new window: Define output link to open a new window on polygon click.
Do you want to display a minimap?: Do you want to display a minimap?

How much to simplify the polyline on eac: How much to simplify the polyline on each zoom level (more = better performance and smoother look, less = more accurate)

name: name
template to use for the popup: template to use for the popup
Must be a CSS valid name (eg.: DarkBlue: Must be a CSS valid name (eg.: DarkBlue or #123456)
Comma, tab or semi-colon separated value: Comma, tab or semi-colon separated values. SRS WGS84 is implied. Only Point geometries are imported. The import will look at the column headers for any mention of «lat» and «lon» at the begining of the header, case insensitive. All other column are imported as properties.
Link with text: [[http://example.com|tex: Link with text: [[http://example.com|text of the link]]
Supported variables that will be dynamic: Supported variables that will be dynamically replaced
You can use feature properties as variab: You can use feature properties as variables: ex.: with "http://myserver.org/images/{name}.png", the {name} variable will be replaced by the "name" value of each markers.
